title: Yuusha no Musume to Midoriiro no Mahoutsukai
original_name: 勇者の娘と緑色の魔法使い
sinopse:
In the depths of a demonic castle filled with monsters, a young hero meets a boy gifted by the supernatural. With a common goal but wildly different motivations, the most unlikely pair sets out on a quest to defeat the Dark Lord!

(Source: MU)
